metadata.title: Video & Audio Processing (ffmpeg, Whisper)
metadata.description: Spec for video/audio processing, ffmpeg, Whisper, metadata extraction, and agent tasks.

overview: The system must support video and audio upload, preview, keyframe extraction, transcription, summarization, and tagging using ffmpeg and Whisper.
requirements: Extract video/audio metadata (duration, codec, bitrate, etc.).
Use ffmpeg for keyframe extraction and thumbnail generation.
Generate embeddings for search (if model available).

ffmpeg.usage: Keyframe extraction, thumbnail generation, format conversion.

agent_tasks: Implement chunked upload endpoint for large files.
Build UI for video/audio preview and tagging.
Write tests for all file types and processing steps.
